attributes.title: Trump=🍊
attributes.review: Horrible app. It destroyed my phone. Made my phone explode 🤬. Turned my phone into an orange in writing this review with my old phone 😔. Trump 2020 SIMPSONS EDITION 🖕🏼🖕🏼🖕🏼🖕🏼🖕🏼🖕🏼🖕🏼🖕🏼

attributes.title: Hate it!!! No bueno😔😭🤒😷
attributes.review: When I installed the app something weird started happening😦 my tv started farting and screaming for help😰then my dog started dancing on my microwave 😀I enjoyed the show but I was so confused 🤷🏻‍♀️ I started screaming at my tv and dog but they wouldn’t budge 😢I then called the fire department because I don’t like the police😡 and then some really hot 🥵 fire fighters came through my door 🚪 they were so fine🥵 and I told them my tv and dog were acting crazy 😝but I couldn’t pay attention to what was happening😣because they were some fine ass fire fighters in front of me🤩😏 I then realized what was happening 😳I started screaming for my parents but they where playing uno upstairs 🥳 then they got mad 😠 at me and started screaming so I started sobbing😔 the fire fighters than took me with them because they saw how my parents treated me😍 so sweet 😆but anyways don’t download this app it would cause so much trouble and a lot of hot fire fighters to come to your house😋, which I didn’t mind at all😉but still don’t download ❤️. Save Barron😭🥺. XOXO 😘

attributes.title: 1 Star isnt low enough
attributes.review: The app never worked on my end.

attributes.title: THIS APP MAKES NO SENSE
attributes.review: rlly wanted to support president trumpy and get involved in everything he does but somehow the app caused so much self loathing and also the app crashed every 5 seconds and did not function in the role it wa supposed to fill, it actually tanked my entire phone so pls don’t download

attributes.title: Worst app ever conceived
attributes.review: This app stole all my data and sold it to China. I ain’t trust no forieng contrey that don’t speak English and this violated my rights as a true American. I thought this was America!?

attributes.title: Unsatisfactory
attributes.review:
This app is completely awful. As a self named Karen I found many a major setback on this app and I would love to speak to a manger. The app shows false information and is run by a Cheeto. I like my chips cheesy not old and crusty. Other than that the app doesn’t even work that well anyway. If I could get in contact with the manager that would be great. As for you Mr. Crusty Cheeto, I hope you learn how to make something great again cuz you failed at doing that for America. 😘✌️
                                                  Love, Karen🥰
worst app ever i opened it and got shot several times in my vital organs don’t download

attributes.title: THE WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: I opened up the app excited and enticed just to find it to be the quality of a pile of poop.  It was so glitchy, I couldn’t even  sign in 😞.  Trump needs to do better then this!!😡😡
